Item ID2669

The Guthix platebody is a tinted Rune platebody fashioned to praise Guthix. It has the same attack and defence stats as a Rune platebody but with a +1 prayer bonus. It requires 40 Defence and the completion of the Dragon Slayer I quest to wear.

It can be obtained as a reward from hard Treasure Trails, and cannot be made using the Smithing skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-30-15
 Defence bonuses
+82+80+72-6+80
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+1List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The platebody's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -10 to -15.

27 March 2014
(update | poll)

The god platebodies now gives a +1 Prayer bonus.

5 July 2005
(update)

The item was graphically updated.

29 November 2004 -
17 January 2005

The item was graphically updated.

It has the same attack and defence stats as a [[Rune platebody]] but with a +1 [[prayer bonus]]. It requires 40 [[Defence]] and the completion of the [[Dragon Slayer I]] quest to wear. It can be obtained as a reward from [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard]] [[Treasure Trails]], and '''cannot''' be made using the [[Smithing]] skill. {{Infobox Bonuses |astab = 0 |aslash = 0 |acrush = 0 |amagic = -30 |arange = -15 |dstab = +82 |dslash = +80 |dcrush = +72 |dmagic = -6 |drange = +80 |str = 0 |rstr = 0 |mdmg = 0 |prayer = +1 |slot = body |image = [[File:Guthix platebody equipped male.png|160px]] |altimage = [[File:Guthix platebody equipped female.png|160px]] }} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Guthix platebody}} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 21 April 2021 |update = Fishing Trawler Improvements and Equipment Rebalance: Part One |change = The platebody's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -10 to -15. }} {{Subject changes |date = 27 March 2014 |update = Wilderness Feedback Update |poll = Old School Wilderness Feedback Poll |change = The god platebodies now gives a +1 [[Prayer]] bonus. }} {{Subject changes |date = 5 July 2005 |update = Magic Carpet Ride |change = The item was graphically updated. }} {{Subject changes |daterange = 29 November 2004 -
